channel.title: Zone Alarm
channel.description:
I decided to try out that Zone-Alarm firewall or whatever it is, and it totally screwed up my internet. It doesn't let me download anything, everytime I try I get a popup that tells me that something tried to get into my computer. I reconfigured the settings for better access and downloading options and it still does the same thing.
I just wanted to know, is Zone-Alarm good? I personally think it's a piece of shit.

item.title: Zone Alarm
item.dc:creator: @Tarantula Tarantula
item.description:
@Tarantula wrote:

I like zonealarm! I think its the best free firewall, very easy to use

Read full topic

item.title: Zone Alarm
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Zonealarm is a very good firewall, make sure you let the programs you need access the internet.
and to fix that problem about getting a message everytime someone tries to get in your computer, theres a checkbox saying do not tell me again, or something along the lines of it.

1 tip though, everynow and then it will ask if you want a free trial of zonealarm pro, i suggest you dont do this because it can mess up your computer, if you want pro, then buy it.

Read full topic

item.title: Zone Alarm
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

ZoneAlarm is definately a good firewall…I still use it myself as it was the first one I tried out and I haven’t been bothered enough by it to look for a different one. I don’t know how decent the automatic program control is, since I manually allow each application’s internet access, but try setting your program control to low temporarily and see if it works any better.

If you have more specific troubles with it, ZoneAlarm tech forums are really good (I’m sure they have a good faq too).

Read full topic

item.title: Zone Alarm
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

well from what you said, it sounds like crap to me but i use mcafee or sumthing lol i dont even know my mom set it up. but u really do need something cuz like jme_009 said you are toast if ur on the net without a firewall these days =)

Read full topic

item.title: Zone Alarm
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I love zone alarm. When you do stuff, just select always remember this setting, and allow it through.

Your toast if your own the net without a firewall these days.

Read full topic
